author: Michele Bertelli
title: Italy to remain in lockdown until at least May 3
description: Some restrictions, on timber companies and bookshops, have been lifted, but others remain shuttered.
content:
Rome, Italy -Italy will remain in full lockdown until May 3 to stem the tide of new coronavirus infections, Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte announced on Friday.
"If we gave up now, we would put all the positive results achieved so far at stake and restart with… [+3840 chars]
